column5: There is a rumor about the Ceasar Lodge that they are in bankcrupcy.They don't answer the phone and they don't reply to e-mailhttp://www.caesarslodge.com/welcome-eng.html

Caesars Lodge did close down. I talked to Olivier from Caesars North Camps about two days ago in an email. He had said that he is getting swamped now with reservations for his north camps. Please dont confused Caesars Lodge with Caesars North Camps they are separate outfitters. Since Olivier opened his own outfitter, service has been great but it always has when i dealt with Olivier.
